amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide $30 million in debenture guarantees and $5 million for operational assistance to fund grants under the New Market Venture Capital program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to designate $5 million in funds for operational assistance grants and $30 million for guarantees of debentures under the Small Business Investment Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore (WI) amendment (A021) Failed by voice vote.
